title: Qualcomm Offer Lead Engineer | Mimecast SSRE
content:

Years of Experience: 9.3 YOE
Current title : Senior Devops Engineer - SDE 3
Current Experience: PRODUCT BASED COMPANY
Prior PAY: 41 LPA Base + 4 Variable

Company: QUALCOMM
Title/Level: Lead Engineer Devops
Location: Bengaluru

New Hire RSU : USD 35000 VESTED IN 3 YEARS
Performance Bonus: 10% OF BASE
Performance Stocks: USD 25k VESTED IN 3 YEARS

Joining Bonus: 2L

first year : 40 + 10(stocks) + 2 JB + 4 PB = 56 LPA
Secondyear: 40 + 17(stocks) + 4 PB = 61 LPA

Company: Mimecast
Title/Level: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 44 LPA
Performance Bonus: 10% OF BASE
Stocks: NA
Joining Bonus: NA

First year = 44 + 4 = 48 LPA

Please suggest where to join.. 
Qualcomm offer is good but seems I have low balled on RSU..

title: PayPal SDE3 OFFER
content:
I hope this information proves useful during your salary discussion with the recruiter. It was helpful in my own discussion, so I wanted to share it to support others and help them benefit as well.
```

Education: Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 5.3 Years
Prior Experience: SDE 2 Product Base Company
Date of the Offer: 9 Dec 2024
Company: PayPal
Title/Level: SDE 3
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 30 LPA Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 35k (Vesting Period 3 years) ~ 10 Lakh per year
Bonus: 10 % of base 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 43 LPA 
Benefits: Standard PayPal Benefit
```

title: Goldman Sachs | Associate | Bengaluru
content:
* Education: BTech NIT
* Years of Experience: 3y4m
* Prior Experience: Software Engineer at B2B Startups
* Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
* Company: Goldman Sachs
* Title/Level: Associate
* Location: Bengaluru
* Salary: 38 LPA (including employer PF)
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0 LPA
* Stock bonus: 0 LPA
* Bonus: 8 LPA 
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 46 LPA
* Benefits: Gym in office (paid extra), Commute to office (paid extra), some other minor things
* Other details: 5 adys WFO

This is for the Master Data Architecture team in Data Engineering, would be great if possible to get some insights from somebody who knows about this team.
